statements: DELETE FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND position = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM employee_demographics WHERE department='HR' AND gender='Female';
DELETE FROM employee_demographics WHERE age >= 40 AND race_ethnicity='Asian';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE id = 2002 OR age < 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE id = 1 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM employee_employment_info WHERE department = 'IT' AND salary < 50000;
DELETE FROM EmployeeJobDetails WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'Engineering';
